title: Cat K - Novel Updates
tags: Animal Characteristics   Black Belly   Carefree Protagonist   Curses   Cute Story   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Kind Love Interests   Language Barrier   Male Yandere   Multiple POV   Naive Protagonist   Narcissistic Protagonist   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Pets   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Royalty   Shameless Protagonist   Slow Romance   Transmigration   Yandere
author: 뜅굴이
description:
I am K.

Born in a country called South Korea, I was a young man from the noble lineage of the “Park” family. One day, I found myself under the curse of a witch in an unfamiliar world, a victim of misfortune.

But pay no heed to my circumstances. Now, I am not a son of the noble “Park” family, nor the “Blackie” of the old witch; I am merely lone-spirited cat K. Nothing more and nothing less.

…even if I may be called the Crown Prince’s “Butterfly.” At least until I find a way to lift this curse, I might as well live comfortably at my Sugar Prince’s expense.

「And with a kiss, I transform into a man by night…」>
